alert.note: Alert for Butte; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL BUTTE AND SOUTHWESTERN MEADE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 708 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Vale, or 12 miles northeast of Sturgis, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hereford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
